verbose_text: Due to the fact that rather long peptides were used and allergen specific IgG responses were induced, this was not a purely T cell peptide based approach, but was similar to an earlier study where recombinant Bet v 1 fragments were used to induce allergen specific IgG [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Bet v 1 fragments were used to induce allergen-specific IgG
